name: HospedagemHost
overview:
HospedagemHost is a Brazilian based web hosting company that provides web hosting solution for businesses from all over the country, services for persons and businesses.

HospedagemHost offers a wide variety of Brazilian domains and a regular amount of international domains options for domain registration.

Hospedagemhost offers Virtual Private Servers and Dedicated Servers, both managed.

Data Centers that carry our web server are located in Dallas, TX and Vancouver, Canada.

Support is made by a smart and easy to use ticket system, universally used in the hosting industry and response time is between 1 to 6 hours depending on the what is asked. In the case of a ticket taking loger that that, our technicians inform about the waiting time.

All systems are monitored 24/7, all systems are upgraded and patched constantly and uptime has been 100% in the last month (december 2011)

If there is any questions about any part of the services, the best way to ge an answer is contacting HospedagemHost directly. You can try the online Chat during Brazilian business hours, or sen an email or form. The team will be glad to answers any questions.
